seo.title: Terrace sunset in Positano
seo.description: A simple, budget-friendly sunset plan at Hostel Brikette: when to arrive and how to keep it stress-free.

intro: For a classic sunset without an expensive long dinner, the hostel terrace is the easiest option.

sections.title: When to arrive
body: In peak season, aim for 30–45 minutes before sunset to get a good spot.
Build buffer time if you’re coming back from the beach or a day trip.

images.alt: Sunset light over Positano from the terrace

sections.title: Budget plan
body: One drink + the view, then simple food: %LINK:cheapEats|cheap eats%.
Full budget day: %LINK:positanoBudget|Positano on a budget%.

fallback: Arrive a bit early, have one drink, then keep dinner simple.
